text: Calliotropis echidna is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Eucyclidae. ==Description== The shell can grow to be 6 mm in length. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs in the Arafura Sea, and off New Caledonia and East Australia at depths between 115 m and 229 m. ==References== * Vilvens C. (2007) New records and new species of Calliotropis from Indo-Pacific. Novapex 8 (Hors Série 5): 1–72. ==External links== * echidna Category:Gastropods described in 1994
title: Calliotropis echidna
